name: sesocket
description: Socket client connecting to local trading api.

scripts.cup: coffee -bcmo lib/ src/ & git commit -am 'modified' & git push
scripts.cupminor: version minor & git commit -am 'minor update' & git push
scripts.cupmajor: version major & git commit -am 'major update' & git push
scripts.cuppatch: version patch & git commit -am 'patch update' & git push

author: Jigme Ko <jigme1968@gmail.com>
